content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-10.5, 24.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position -10.5, 24.5)
- Boiler (position x, y)
- Steam engine (position x, y)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors related to stale entity data
- Ensure that the entities are properly initialized and not in a stale state before attempting to perform actions on them. This may involve checking the status of entities or refreshing their data.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
